msg: All the Number->Number variants now have generic base classes.

author: doogie
msg: Add abstract classes to unify simple object to singleton collections.

author: doogie
msg: BUG FIX: Actually implement proper simple array testing; the previously
added ArrayObjectToList converter was never actually used.

author: doogie
msg: Fix init script stop, to wait for jsvc to actually finish running.  This
fixes a race condition that can occur under load, where ofbiz is not
listening on the status port, but jsvc is actually still running.  This
would cause the pid file to exist, but then get removed by jsvc before
the init script could remove it itself.
